name: Quack Jack
description:
A game about defending your ducks from yodas with playing cards and black jack rules. Created for Miz Jam 1.

I didn't get time to spend 48 hours instead got in 31.
First official game jam. Don't go easy on me. Would love feedback and ideas.

Devlog coming soon
